featured.text: The earliest traders arrived around 900 AD. (B)
Traders from Asia had already visited the islands 900 years before the arrival of its first permanent settlers from the African mainland (around 1000 AD).
On an ad featuring contemporary arts.
He marketed his brand by giving clothes to famous MTV stars and featuring teen stars in his print ads.

definition.zh_def: 廣告，通常用於促銷產品或服務的宣傳信息。
definition.en_def: An advertisement, often used to promote products or services.
definition.example: I saw an ad for a new smartphone on TV.
